Text: I nʼichi eka n, uko̩la la de̩ n;
Iku e̩ñwa-wñ ledufu tʼugbo du ane̩-ile̩-i,
e-le̩ adufu wa dab o̩ko̩ya tito̩ ki akwʼef unyi-wñ dufu,
O̩la ki Jihofa kajane̩ ñw one̩ ki de̩ chʼo̩kpakpa,
I dukpe̩ kʼone̩ ki ñeju e̩wñ le̩ du tʼo̩jamalia le,
Anoji-wñ, ma nʼe-le̩ ajuka ñw adu-we̩-i ge̩;
E̩ ki ño̩ fʼadu-we̩ wubi bʼuba eba te̩;
E̩ che kʼo̩la alu-mi kpai aye ki dʼe̩do̩-mi
